title: Getting Honor level 3 as a New Player
body:
I just recently joined League of Legends, and my friends told me about the honor system and that they got to level 3, which yielded them a capsule and a flare. Yet when I go to the forums and search about the people who got it, it seems as everyone got to level 3 at about the same time, which was a pretty long while after the honor system came out. Does that mean that new players like me won't reach honor level 3 by the end of the season?

Thanks in advance :)

replies.body: I think it's safe to say that a large bulk of the players who've already hit Honour 3 are the ones who were "ahead" in progression, such as those who play and get Honoured a lot. There's still plenty of people who haven't quite hit it yet. As for reaching Honour 3 by the end of the season, it *should* be attainable as a new player. There's still 2-3 months until then and it seems, based on how it's gone so far, that it takes 1-2 months to hit level 3, depending on how often you play and get Honoured.
